map: function(doc) { var d = new Date(doc['modification_time']); var bcodes = doc['illumina']['Demultiplex_Stats']['Barcode_lane_statistics']; if(d.getFullYear()==2013 && bcodes.length) { var yields = {}; for(var bc in bcodes) { var lane = parseInt(bcodes[bc]['Lane'],10); var yield = bcodes[bc]['Yield (Mbases)'].replace(',','.'); if(!(lane in yields)) { yields[lane] = {}; } yields[lane][bcodes[bc]['Index']] = parseFloat(yield); } emit(doc['name'],yields); } }
